transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji madam bataye. 
Customer: Good afternoon sir, speaking. 
Executive: Kya ji?
Customer: Hello, good afternoon. 
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai sir aapko meri?
Executive: Aa rahi hai, bataye madam.
Customer: Ji sir actually na kal aapne na Suryansh sir ko call kiya tha. Hai na, dopahar mein. To na hum call na receive nahi kar paye the actually aapki. Jab after afternoon mein aap aapne unko call ko na call kiya tha to hamari evening mein ho gayi thi meeting. To ab aapko hi aapko catalog mein update ka kuch issue to nahi hai. Matlab ki madam abhi sab kuch ho gaya tha na kuch bhi update reh gaya ho. 
Executive: Madam abhi koi update nahi reh gaya aur abhi hum thoda vyastata mein bhi hai.
Executive: Hum aapko callback kar lete hai.
Customer: Okay theek hai to main na content close kar deti hu sir fir aapka na incoming jo aaya hua tha usko uska to resolve ho gaya na problem kal kal wala.
Executive: Ha ha ho gaya.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- To check if the customer has any catalog update issues.



Resolution:

- Customer confirmed no updates pending, currently busy.

- Executive offered to callback later.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, callback
